scripts.prebuild: (ls ../../gradio/templates/frontend/assets) || (cd ../../ui && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile && pnpm build && cd ../website/homepage) || (npm install pnpm && cd ../../ui && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile && npm install pnpm && pnpm build && cd ../website/homepage)
scripts.build:html: python render_html.py && html-minifier --input-dir generated --output-dir dist --file-ext html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-js true
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:setup && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:assets
scripts.start: npm run build && chokidar 'src/**' '../guides/*' -c 'echo '{path}' && if [[ {path} =~ ^src/.*.html ]]; then npm run build:html && npm run build:css; elif [[ {path} =~ ^../guides/.* ]]; then npm run build:html && npm ; elif [[ {path} =~ ^src/.*.css ]]; then npm run build:html && npm run build:css; elif [[ {path} =~ ^src/assets/.* ]]; then npm run build:assets; fi; echo 0 '
